data.title: INDIAN ACTRESS RASNA GIRL TARUNI SACHDEV DIED AT THE YOUNG AGE : – A. K. Nandy's
data.meta_description: The competitive rat race of proving to the world has been taking a toll over us since eons, and who better than Bollywood celebrities would know this better? From the media paparazzi to making it big in the entertainment world, the struggle is an unending affair. In the hubbub of climbing up the ladder, sometimes…
data.text: The competitive rat race of proving to the world has been taking a toll over us since eons, and who better than Bollywood celebrities would know this better? From the media paparazzi to making it big in the entertainment world, the struggle is an unending affair. In the hubbub of climbing up the ladder, sometimes they trip and lose all that they have. The Rasna girl, who won hearts playing the school girl in Amitabh Bachchan-starrer ‘Paa’, she died in a plane crash in Nepal in 2012. In a cruel twist of fate, she lost her life on her birthday, July 14
